text: The Incredible Hulk is a steel launched roller coaster. It is at Islands of Adventure in Orlando, Florida. It is themed and named after Hulk, a popular comic book superhero character. It has a launched tube known as the Gamma Tube that the roller coaster launches from. The ride was manfactured by Bolliger & Mabillard and has 7 inversions. It was the only Bolliger & Mabillard launched roller coaster in the world until Thunderbird opened. == Inversions == The Incredible Hulk has the following inversions: #Zero G Roll #Cobra roll #2 Loops #Corkscrew ==Other websites== * Category:Roller coasters in the United States Category:Orlando, Florida Category:Steel roller coasters Category:Hulk (Marvel Comics) Category:Roller coasters by name Category:Launched roller coasters
title: The Incredible Hulk Coaster
